title: ISic003469. I.Sicily inscription 003469
body:
1Cereri · Iuliae · Augustae
2Divi · Augusti · Matri
3Ti(beri) · Caesaris · Augusti
4Lutatia · C(ai) · f(ilia) · sacerdos · Augustae
5\Imp(eratoris) perpet(ui)/ uxor
6M(arci) · Livi · M(arci) · f(ili) · Qui(rina) · Optati · flaminis · G[a]ul(itanorum) ·
7Iuliae · Augusti \Imp(eratoris) · perpet(ui)/ · cum V
8liberis · s(ua) · p(ecunia) consacravit

l.5 Imperatoris perpetui del | l.7 Imperatoris · perpetui del

1CERERI·IULIAE·AUGUSTAE
2DIVI·AUGUSTI·MATRI
3TI·CAESARIS·AUGUSTI
4LUTATIA·C·F·SACERDOS·AUGUSTAE
5\IMPPERPET/UXOR
6M·LIVI·M·F·QUI·OPTATI·FLAMINIS·G[.]UL·
7IULIAE·AUGUSTI\IMP·PERPET/·CUMV
8LIBERIS·S·PCONSACRAVIT

l.5 Imperatoris perpetui del | l.7 Imperatoris · perpetui del

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

English translation

Alex Antoniou

To Ceres Iulia Augusta, (wife of the) deified Augustus, mother of Tiberius Caesar Augustus, Lutatia, daughter of Gaius, sacerdos of Augusta the wife of the perpeptual Imperator, wife of Marcus Livius Optatus, son of Marcus, of tribe Quirina, flamen of the Gaulitani of Iulia Augusta wife of the eternal Imperator, consecrated [this] with [her husband?] and children, from her own money

commentary
